ygData.subject: RE: Pzygin
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, I was told wrong then. I was told that Varsoon was the tough one. I dont think that Varsoon the Undead was in at the time, maybe he was changed? Belgarth
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, I was told wrong then. I was told that Varsoon
was the tough one. I dont think that Varsoon the
Undead was in at the time, maybe he was changed?

Belgarth

--- "Treadway, Donald" <DTreadway@...> wrote:
> From: "Treadway, Donald" <DTreadway@...>
>
> Varsoon is much lower, in the teens, but when you
> kill Varsoon, Varsoon the
> Undying spawns. He looks like a zombie and is MUCH
> tougher. He was blue to
> me at 35, so not sure exactly his level. I wasn't
> able to take him solo,
> that's for sure. I heard that after he chased me
> running and screaming like
> a girl into surefall glade, he was killed by a level
> 50 wiz, who I guess had
> killed Varsoon in the first place.
>
> Telon on E'ci
